1.title: 2015 MTV VMA Red Carpet Special with Brandi Cyrus and People Magazine

episode of.title: 2015 MTV Video Music Awards with People Magazine (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

1.plot: Brandi Cyrus hosts the 2015 MTV Video Music Awards Red Carpet Special for 1iota and People Magazine. Brandi catches up with her family, Big Sean, Fall Out Boy's Pete Wentz & Patrick Stump, Shawn Mendes, Kat Graham, and they play the #WreckingBallGame!

2.title: O'Shea Jackson Jr. Says He Is "Prepared for Anything" from VMA Host Miley Cyrus

episode of.title: 2015 MTV Video Music Awards with People Magazine (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

2.plot: O'Shea Jackson Jr. from "Straight Outta Compton" tells Brandi Cyrus what he thinks about Miley Cyrus hosting and plays the #WreckingBallGame.

3.title: Shawn Mendes Tells Us Who Gets His Vote for Video of the Year at the 2015 MTV VMAs

episode of.title: 2015 MTV Video Music Awards with People Magazine (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

3.plot: Shawn Mendes tells Brandi Cyrus who he'd vote for Video of The Year, how it's like being on tour with Taylor Swift and his thoughts on Miley Cyrus! Shawn also plays the #WreckingBallGame featuring an outrageous tweet!

4.title: Fall Out Boy Guess Most Insane Thing Miley Cyrus Could Do at the 2015 MTV VMAs

episode of.title: 2015 MTV Video Music Awards with People Magazine (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

4.plot: Pete Wentz and Patrick Stump of Fall Out Boy give us their prediction on what the most insane thing Miley will do as the host, and play the #WreckingBallGame with Brandi Cyrus at the 2015 MTV VMA Red Carpet.

5.title: Big Sean Teases New Collaboration with Miley on the 2015 MTV VMA Red Carpet

episode of.title: 2015 MTV Video Music Awards with People Magazine (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

5.plot: Big Sean talks to Brandi Cyrus about being nominated for VMAs and working with Miley Cyrus and how he really feels about Miley.

6.title: Silento Hopes Miley Cyrus Will Break Out the "Whip/Nae Nae" on the VMA Stage

episode of.title: 2015 MTV Video Music Awards with People Magazine (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

6.plot: Silento talks to Brandi Cyrus about this his hit song, "Watch Me (Whip/Nae Nae)" and being excited to see Miley host and hit the "Whip / Nae Nae" on stage! Silento also plays the #WreckingBallGame.

7.title: It's a #CyrusTakeover as the Cyrus Family Supports Miley at the 2015 MTV VMAs

episode of.title: 2015 MTV Video Music Awards with People Magazine (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

7.plot: It's a #CyrusTakeover on the 2015 MTV VMA with the Cyrus family including Billy Ray Cyrus, Tish, Noah, and Braison telling Brandi Cyrus about what they expect from Miley and even play the #WreckingBallGame!

8.title: Tyler Oakley and Grace Helbig Talk Tongues, Miley & Nicki Minaj at the VMAS

episode of.title: 2015 MTV Video Music Awards with People Magazine (TV Mini-Series 2015– )

8.plot: YouTube Superstars Tyler Oakley and Grace Helbig talk tongues, Miley & Nicki Minaj at the VMAS and play the #WreckingBallGame.

akas: 2015 MTV Video Music Awards with People Magazine (United States)
